entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Rain mixed with snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
